kubejs.ponder.ae2_multiblock.text_1: The Controller multiblock must fit in a 7x7x7 area.
kubejs.ponder.ae2_multiblock.text_2: A Controller block can only touch up to 3 other Controller blocks.
kubejs.ponder.ae2_multiblock.text_3: Placing a fourth Controller will disrupt the network.
kubejs.ponder.ae2_multiblock.text_4: Something like this is the most efficient design.
kubejs.ponder.ae2_multiblock.text_5: This setup has 48 easily-accessible sides, enough for 1536 channels!
kubejs.ponder.ae2_multiblock.text_6: It's highly recommended to use P2P Tunnels.
kubejs.ponder.ae2_multiblock.text_7: The middle blocks can each connect to 4 P2P Tunnels!
kubejs.ponder.ae2_multiblock.text_8: Including the center sides, there are 72 faces, enough for 2304 channels!
kubejs.ponder.ae2_single.text_1: The ME Controller is the brain of the network.
kubejs.ponder.ae2_single.text_10: Color your Cables to keep them separate.
kubejs.ponder.ae2_single.text_11: Ponder originally made for FTB University 1.19!
kubejs.ponder.ae2_single.text_3: Done properly, a single Controller can support 192 channels
kubejs.ponder.ae2_single.text_5: You might think, "Why not just add another Controller wherever?"
kubejs.ponder.ae2_single.text_7: Having two separate Controllers will disrupt the network, shutting the whole thing down.
kubejs.ponder.ae2_single.text_8: However, placing Controllers together will form a multiblock!
kubejs.ponder.ae2_single.text_9: The more faces, the more channels!
kubejs.ponder.basic_usage.text_1: The Base of this distillation tower is the Cast Iron Distillation Controller
kubejs.ponder.basic_usage.text_2: Tower is assembled by placing three Distiller on top of the Controller
kubejs.ponder.basic_usage.text_3: Finally place a Blaze Burner underneath
kubejs.ponder.hephaestus_forge_construct: Ensure You Have A Clear Surface
Place Arcane Polished Darkstone In This Formation
Surround The Center Piece Of Arcane Polished Darkstone With Chiseled Arcane Polished Darkstone
Fill In The Rest With Polished Darkstone
Once Again, Ensure You Have A Clear Surface Around Your Base
Now, Place A Smithing Table In The Centre Of The Base
kubejs.ponder.hephaestus_forge_setup.tex: Now You Have Constructed Your Forge You'll Need To Set It Up For Rituals!
Pedestals Will Be Required To Create Rituals.
The Hephaestus Forge Is Useless Without A Source Of Aureal.
Construct This Structure Near Your Forge.
